Plain Text ListSubmit a list

Submit a list

Please make sure your list...

  • Is backed by a reputable source
  • Is objective and definitive
    • Bad: List of coolest restaurants in London
    • Bad: List of the worst movies
  • Is finite (preferably <2000 items length)
    • Bad: List of colors
    • Bad: List of stars
  • Is appropriate for all ages
  • Isn't spam or a scam

I will review every submission and let you know if your list has been approved and published. Your contribution helps others.

List data
Insert a new line for each data item. Do not include line numbers, bullet points, or any other formatting.
